name: Cat In City Go Simulator
description:
Cat In City Go Simulator. Love lions and cats? Living a life of a homeless cat in the city in the first person. Look for food and not fall into trouble! Carefully run on the road since there are a lot of cars. Help Kitty to survive is not easy road of life. This simulator cat life, where you will be able to fully penetrate and live the life of a kitten. Unique 3D graphics and animation looks very realistic.
This game is a real pocket-sized cat in your phone. Always dreamed of his beloved pet in your phone? Download and try the unique emulator!
Thanks for the game. Write a comment and we will improve it with the next update!
